name: Faith in the Great Wolf
benefit: You are inspired by the strength of the pack leader.

name: Faith in the All-Mother Bear
benefit: You are protected by the resilience of a mother's love.

name: The Law of the Pack
benefit: You understand that the group is stronger than the individual.

name: The Alpha's Will
benefit: You believe in strength above all, and that you are the source of your own power.

name: Social Dynamics
benefit: You see social interactions as a system to be analyzed and understood.
